system.description:
It’s a matter of some debate which is more powerful: your mind or your convictions. Fortunately for you, you don’t have to choose. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Intelligence, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You gain the Thymokinetic Mind Strike option if you do not have it or another of your choice if you do. Your Thymokinetic mind strikes can now deal radiant damage in addition to the other available types. In addition to dealing damage, the target must make a Constitution saving throw or become Dazzled until the end of its next turn.
  • When you would learn a new Noetic or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.zj2p68ex28alzo9i]{Divine Lesson}, you can choose freely from either list.
  • Half your esper levels count as herald levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.b6bbf481xmj9mi6u]{Extra Attack} feature.
  • Half your herald levels count as esper levels for the purpose of the Intellect Fortress feature.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in esper, 3 levels in herald
